participant_1.background:
I think my family would be supportive because they are accepting of people who are different.
i live with my paps and grandma.
i grew up in alabama.
i like to play guitar.
i study philosophy at mass.

participant_2.background:
I am a police officer who has to run after criminals in my boots, but I still enjoy playing basketball in my free time.
I listen to jazz because it's a timeless genre that's perfect for relaxing in my vintage-styled home.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
zebras are my favorite animals.
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I'm a police officer. I love my job because I get to help people.
That's really cool! I'm a philosophy student at UMass. I'm hoping to eventually become a professor.
That's awesome! What kind of philosophy are you interested in?
I'm mostly interested in ethics and metaphysics. I love learning about how we can live our lives in the best way possible, and I'm also interested in the nature of reality.
Those are both really interesting topics! I'm not much of a philosopher myself, but I do enjoy listening to jazz. It's a really relaxing genre of music.
I love jazz too! It's the perfect music to listen to when you're trying to relax or concentrate.
I agree! It's also great for parties.
Yeah, it's always a good time to listen to jazz.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play guitar, go hiking, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to play basketball, go fishing, and spend time with my family too.
That's awesome! We should get together sometime and play some basketball.
That would be great! I'd love to play some basketball.
Cool! I'll send you a message later and we can set something up.
